TaskDescription: Click button NewWorkpiece to add a new workpiece to the scene. As you can see it covers the first photocell in the process line. It's tag is PhotocellEntry. Furthermore we start MotorCompressor when SwitchCompressor is active to build up some preasure for later, when pistons will be used. To complete the test, wait for 3 seconds to build up the preasure

ChatBubbles.Text: This is the button to add new workpiece. You can also press X on the keyboard.
This is the SwitchCompressor. Program it to turn on MotorCompressor.
If the  the preasure level bar is empty, pistons won't move.
